title: Bed Bath & Beyond Goes to the Moon
sub_head: Shares surged after GameStop chairman disclosed stake in struggling retailer
body:
Diamond hands might be a struggling retailer’s best friend.
Bed Bath & Beyond ’s shares surged as much as 86% Monday morning after Ryan Cohen, the billionaire co-founder of online pet-products retailer Chewy and chairman of GameStop , disclosed a 9.8% stake in Bed Bath & Beyond through his investment firm. In a letter addressed to the retailer’s board, Mr. Cohen outlined steps the company might take, including narrowing its strategic focus, spinning off the faster-growing Buybuy Baby business and evaluating a sale to a private-equity buyer.
